original_text: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other; and him that taketh away thy cloak forbid not to take thy coat also.
korean_text: 너의 이 뺨을 치는 자에게 저 뺨도 돌려대며 네 겉옷을 빼앗는 자에게 속옷도 거절하지 말라

sentences.original_text: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 한쪽 뺨을 때리는 사람에게

sentences.original_text: and him that taketh away thy cloak
forbid not to take thy coat also
